channel.title: Brian Tyree Henry on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Brian Tyree Henry on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Brian Tyree Henry Was Working Out His Relationship With His Real Father Through His ‘Dope Thief’ Character
item.description: “There was a lot of therapy that I was getting out,” admits the Emmy-nominated actor who lost his dad while filming the AppleTV+ series.
